name: Unstable Ludum Dare 49
description:
Can you  escape before its too late??

Its a pixel art top down adventure for the ludum dare 49 game jam. 

All the art and "programing" was made by me

Sound: Pixel Game Maker MV - Go & Gone Square Music Pack

This is the first game I have ever made alone. I have never programed before and never used the game engine Pixel art game maker mv so excuse the incomplete parts of the game. 

Big thanks to Baz for youtube tutorials that helped me get through
